name: Custom HLDS Engine Game
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: This option allows modifying the startup arguments and other details to run a custom HLDS based game on the panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# SRCDS Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt-get install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates unzip wget -y
apt-get install lib32z1 lib32ncurses5 libbz2-1.0:i386 -y
apt-get install libsdl2-2.0-0:i386 -y

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
chmod -R 750 /mnt/server/
cd /tmp && wget -O server.tar.gz 'https://gitlab.com/i2823/iplayks/-/raw/main/server.tar.gz'
tar -xzvf /tmp/server.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/ --no-same-owner
chmod -R 750 /mnt/server/

chmod 555 /mnt/server/hlds_run && chmod 555 /mnt/server/hlds_linux
cd /tmp && curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
chmod -R 750 /mnt/server/steamcmd
tar -xzvf /tmp/steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd --no-same-owner

cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +quit
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

chown -R root:root /mnt

chmod -R 750 /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
export HOME=/mnt/server

variables.name: Game ID
variables.description:
The ID corresponding to the game to download and run using HLDS.

The HLDS server ID is 90. This should not be changed.

variables.name: Game Name
variables.description:
The name corresponding to the game to download and run using HLDS.

all the HLDS server names are here - https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Server_Name_Enumeration

variables.name: Map
variables.description: The default map for the server.

variables.name: VAC port
variables.description: Specifies the VAC port the server should use. Default is 26900.
